study_title: Visel A, Minovitsky S, Dubchak I, Pennacchio LA. VISTA Enhancer Browser-a database of tissue-specific human enhancers
description: Validated enhancers from VISTA. We select only positive human elements. Once downloaded, 2APR2017, the data were processed as follow: 'grep ">Human" vista_2APR2017.txt | grep "positive" | awk '{split($0,a,"|"); print a[2], a[5]}' > vista_2APR2017_processed.txt'. More info available here: https://enhancer.lbl.gov/aboutproject_n.html
